1: I look up[c] toward the hills. From where[d] does my help come?
2: My help comes from the Lord,[e] the Creator[f] of heaven and earth.
3: May he not allow your foot to slip. May your Protector[g] not sleep.[h]
4: Look! Israel's Protector[i] does not sleep or slumber.
5: The Lord is your protector; the Lord is the shade at your right hand.
6: The sun will not harm you by day, or the moon by night.[j]
7: The Lord will protect you from all harm; he will protect your life.
8: The Lord will protect you in all you do,[k] now and forevermore.
